about.title: Biography
about.p1: At 21 years old, studying Computer Science (specializing in Secure Application Development) at IUT Montpellier-S√®te, I am a technology enthusiast particularly drawn to cybersecurity challenges. For me, computer science is a discipline that combines technical rigor with a human dimension.
about.p2: Currently an Assistant Project Engineer at ITESOFT in Aimargues (30470) in hybrid mode, I dedicate my energy and skills to an innovative company in the software development sector. My goal is to continue my education by joining CNAM in Cybersecurity or Polytech Montpellier in DevOps, while continuing my apprenticeship at Itesoft. I aspire to evolve from the Project Delivery department to the IT Security department to align my apprenticeship with my training and develop expertise in cybersecurity, a field I am particularly passionate about.
about.p3: Actively involved for two years in the Student Bureau (BDE) as Event and Communication Manager, I have developed skills in project management, organizing federating events, and communication. This experience has allowed me to strengthen my interpersonal skills and my ability to lead initiatives from A to Z, illustrating my ability to reconcile technical rigor with interpersonal dynamism.
about.p4: Originally from the Var region and studying in Montpellier, my past practice of handball has instilled in me a strong team spirit and great perseverance, qualities I apply to overcome both technical and organizational challenges.

itesoft.title: Itesoft - Assistant Project Engineer
itesoft.tech: Java, JavaScript, Angular, Docker, Termius, FileZilla
itesoft.desc:
SITUATION: Apprenticeship at Itesoft, leader in digitization.
MISSION: Adapt the Streamline Invoice solution to client needs.
ACTION: Fullstack development (Java/Angular), Docker containerization, and scripting.
RESULT: Delivery of critical customizations and responsive user support.

tamastat.title: TamaStat
tamastat.tech: PHP, MVC Architecture, MySQL, CSV, JavaScript
tamastat.desc:
SITUATION: Internship at Tamabox, need to visualize complex data.
MISSION: Create an interactive statistical dashboard.
ACTION: Design of an MVC architecture in PHP/MySQL with optimized CSV import.
RESULT: Tool in production allowing real-time performance analysis.

ecommerce.title: Perfume E-commerce Site
ecommerce.desc:
SITUATION: University web development project.
MISSION: Create a complete e-commerce site with administration.
ACTION: Fullstack PHP/MySQL development, cart management and history.
RESULT: Functional platform with secured back-office.

referendum.title: Referendum
referendum.desc:
SITUATION: Academic secure voting project.
MISSION: Guarantee anonymity and integrity of votes.
ACTION: Implementation of cryptographic algorithms in Java and Agile project management.
RESULT: Functional prototype validated with honors.

lobbybot.title: Fortnite Bot in Python
lobbybot.tech: Python, REST API, HTML, CSS, Discord
lobbybot.desc:
SITUATION: Passion for game tool development.
MISSION: Create a Python library to simulate Fortnite lobbies.
ACTION: Development of a REST API and massively used Discord integration.
RESULT: Community of +8500 members, first revenue generated.

tweet.title: AutoTweetVideoUploader
tweet.desc:
SITUATION: Need to automate video content sharing.
MISSION: Bot that downloads and reposts X (Twitter) videos.
ACTION: Python scripting with queue management and Twitter API.
RESULT: Complete automation of the sharing workflow.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.desc:
SITUATION: Need for a modern professional showcase.
MISSION: Create a high-performance, accessible, and 'Wow' portfolio.
ACTION: Development from scratch, PWA optimization, i18n, and micro-interactions.
RESULT: Fast site (Lighthouse Score 95+), bilingual, and attractive.

gamejam.title: Code Game Jam
gamejam.desc:
SITUATION: Video game development contest (30h).
MISSION: Create a complete game 'Shadow Of Memory'.
ACTION: Rapid prototyping in Unreal Engine 5, stress and time management.
RESULT: Playable game finalized within the time limits.

nuitinfo.title: Night of Info
nuitinfo.desc:
SITUATION: National hackathon on the theme of climate.
MISSION: Create an interactive awareness site in one night.
ACTION: Coordination of a team of 6, collaborative web development.
RESULT: Site deployed and functional, intense team management experience.
PROJECT: An interactive and fun application to raise awareness of responsible digital issues (CSR by Design)...

meta.description: Portfolio of Killian Ramus, Assistant Project Engineer at Itesoft. Student in Computer Science (DACS - Security) in Montpellier. Discover my projects in web development, Python, Java and cybersecurity.

bde.title: BDE Computer Science Montpellier
bde.desc: Event and Communication Manager. Organizing events (parties, tournaments) and managing communication (Discord, Instagram).

studies.title: Further Studies
studies.desc: My goal is to continue my studies in a work-study program in Montpellier, either at CNAM in cybersecurity or at Polytech Montpellier in DevOps, to specialize in the fields I am passionate about.

ce_definitions.details_ac1: Choose and implement efficient data structures and algorithms.
ce_definitions.details_ac2: Install and configure workstations and network services.
ce_definitions.details_ac3: Design and manipulate SQL and NoSQL databases.
ce_definitions.details_ac4: Plan and monitor a team project using agile tools.
ce_definitions.CE2.01: By formalizing and modeling complex situations
ce_definitions.CE2.02: By identifying common algorithms and data structures
ce_definitions.CE2.04: By justifying choices and validating results
ce_definitions.CE4.01: By respecting regulations regarding privacy and personal data protection
ce_definitions.CE4.02: By respecting economic, societal, and ecological issues of data storage use
ce_definitions.CE5.01: By communicating effectively with different project stakeholders
ce_definitions.CE5.02: By respecting legal rules and current standards
ce_definitions.CE5.03: By raising awareness of ethical, responsible, sustainable, and intercultural management
ce_definitions.CE5.04: By adopting a proactive, creative, and critical approach
